me.Tiernanator.Menu

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Tiernanator.Menu.Menu

  • public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
    The Menu class is an API that allows you to easily create a GUI within Minecraft Each entry within the Menu is handled by MenuEntry.
    Since:
    19-11-2016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tiernan

    • Constructor Detail

      • Menu

        public Menu(java.lang.String menuName,
            java.util.List<MenuEntry> menuEntries)
        Generate a new Menu
        Parameters:
        menuName - The name of the menu as seen by the player
        menuEntries - A list of MenuEntry values representing each entry in the menu

      • Menu

        public Menu(java.lang.String menuName,
            java.util.List<MenuEntry> menuEntries,
            int menuSize)
        Generate a new Menu
        Parameters:
        menuName - The name visible to the players
        menuEntries - A list of MenuEntry values representing each entry in the menu
        menuSize - An integer value, that is a factor of 9, less than 54, representing the total nu,ber of menu entries

      • Menu

        public Menu(java.lang.String menuName,
            java.util.List<MenuEntry> menuEntries,
            int menuSize,
            boolean scrollable)
        Generate a new Menu
        Parameters:
        menuName - The name visible to the players
        menuEntries - A list of MenuEntry values representing each entry in the menu
        menuSize - An integer value, that is a factor of 9, less than 54, representing the total nu,ber of menu entries
        scrollable - Override whether you want to have a multi-page menu
